content: MFT-FOX HT L Bracket Horizontal fiberglass bracket - Large ### Categories: Home > Products > Facade mounting systems > Brackets- - - ### FEATURES:Features Thermal bridge-free solution Glass-fiber reinforced plastic and aluminium compound for low thermal conductivity and high load performance Labor saving - Pre-assembled A4 screw for easy fastening of support profiles Up to 40 mm adjustability of the support profile Multiple fastening options â€“ can be installed using suitable anchors, screws or direct fastening (DX) Applications Suitable for low-energy buildings Suitable for low-energy buildings, Passivhaus and Minergie standard One-layer system with horizontally mounted support profiles Two-layer system with horizontally and vertically mounted substructure profiles ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 Width: 62 mm Height: 150 mm Technical Data | Material composition | Polyamide, EN AW-6063 T66 | Width | 62 mm | Height | 150 mm ### ITEMS- 2097007 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 220 L 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097008 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 240 L 5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097009 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 240 L 6,5 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097010 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 240 L 11 - Package Size 25 pc - 2097011 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 260 L 5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097012 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 260 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097013 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 260 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097014 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 280 L 5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097015 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 280 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097016 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 280 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097017 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 300 L 5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097018 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 300 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097019 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 300 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097020 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 320 L 5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097021 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 320 L 6,5 - Package Size 20 pc - 2097022 - Bracket MFT-FOX HT 320 L 11 - Package Size 20 pc
